pkgmetadata.longdescription: Covariate Adjustment in RCT by Higher-Order Influence Functions // Estimates treatment effects using covariate adjustment methods in Randomized Clinical Trials (RCT) motivated by higher-order influence functions (HOIF). Provides point estimates, oracle bias, variance, and approximate variance for HOIF-adjusted estimators. For methodology details, see Zhao et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2411.08491.
